item.title: Jaxx is The First Multi-Platform Ethereum Light Wallet
item.description:
Jaxx is The First Multi-Platform Ethereum Light Wallet

Decentral, the Canadian consultancy, and software development company, announced today the release of Jaxx wallet version 1.0, the first multi-platform Ethereum/Bitcoin light wallet, Jaxx is available on iOS, Android, PC/Mac/Linux desktops, and as a Chrome/Firefox browser extension.

item.title: Defense claims Bitcoin is not money in Miami laundering case
item.description:
Defense claims Bitcoin is not money in Miami laundering case

A University professor testified Friday at a money laundering trial in Miami, Florida, that Bitcoin could not be considered money under Florida law and was more akin to poker chips.

item.title: Digital Currency is Transforming Online Industries
item.description:
Digital Currency is Transforming Online Industries

Digital currency is a fairly new technology that is changing and disrupting many of the traditional online Industries. In fact, the technology behind digital currency has the potential to be a much greater disruptive force than the cryptocurrency itself.

item.title: Litecoin Is Far More Popular Among CNY Traders Than Ethereum
item.description:
Litecoin Is Far More Popular Among CNY Traders Than Ethereum

Cryptocurrency trading is booming in China, and the rest of the world is following suit. Bitcoin is the top cryptocurrency in just about every country. But the competition between Litecoin and Ethereum is still in full effect for CNY traders, whereas things look very different in the USD market.

item.title: Bitcoin ATMs Are Popular With the Unbanked, But the Regulatory Future Is Unclear
item.description:
Bitcoin ATMs Are Popular With the Unbanked, But the Regulatory Future Is Unclear

A trend is emerging in the Bitcoin ATM industry. Demand for the services among the underbanked and unbanked has seen steady growth in the two years since the industry's first Bitcoin ATMs-often referred to as Bitcoin Transaction Machines, or BTMs-were installed.

item.title: Who came up with the ideas for Ethereum and why?
item.description:
Who came up with the ideas for Ethereum and why?

Answer: Vitalik Buterin, is the original inventor of Ethereum, he understood that Bitcoin has a fundamental limit as, while it's scriptable, it can not hold state in its transactions. Having this additional feature would make it easy for a blockchain to have smart contracts. A programming langua...

item.title: QIWI to Lead Russian R3 Effort
item.description:
QIWI to Lead Russian R3 Effort

According to Russian news outlet Izvestia, local payments processor QIWI intends to become the driving force behind creation of a consortium of Russian banks interested in development of blockchain applicability standards. The publication references to an unnamed source close to the processor.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; 575 A Realistic Target
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; 575 A Realistic Target

Here's what we are focusing on for this morning's session in the bitcoin price. We are about to head into a Fresh European session this morning in the bitcoin price, and there's plenty to talk about.

item.title: Lead Tor Developer Keeps Getting Harassed By FBI
item.description:
Lead Tor Developer Keeps Getting Harassed By FBI

The FBI seems to have taken an unusual interest in Tor lead developer Isis Agora Lovecruft. In fact, she has accused the law enforcement agency of harassment For the time being, it remains unclear as to why the FBI wants to talk to her so desperately, but there is no legal obligation for Lovecruft to do so.

item.title: Jaxx Is The First Ethereum Wallet To Be Released on iOS
item.description:
Jaxx Is The First Ethereum Wallet To Be Released on iOS

What makes the Jaxx wallet so unique is how users can store both Bitcoin and Ethereum - the top two cryptocurrencies - in one and the same wallet.
